welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Bondues, France! Immerse yourself in the city's rich history, beautiful architecture, and famous culinary delights as you explore and experience all that Bondues has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for Lesquin Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for low-cost and seasonal flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a password from the information desk.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kortrijk Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Kortrijk Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
